都0202年了，连个像样的匹配系统都做不出来，还采用的是房间机制，玩家水平和配置方差是不是太大了点，而且为什么游戏内人类阵营的交流这么困难，除了两个手势之外其他一点方法都没了，每个人的嘴都是拿来被砍得时候叫的吗，而且屠夫房主这个机制就尼玛离谱，碰到个300延迟以上的，走路都在飘，你别跟我说碰到卡的就退啊，我寻思5把里面三把卡逼，老子的时间全拿来筛选这个房间能不能玩是这个意思吗，16年的游戏20年了游戏前聊天还是打不出中文，但凡有点交流的，看起来都跟看天书一样费劲，角色技能栏位还跟着等级走，那我寻思我新人物进去带一个技能能不能不要给我匹传承技能拉满祭品拉满的屠夫啊，说起这个传承技能，每个角色传承点完之后，不都是一张皮吗，传承技能还能通过圣所买，那我请问我如果圣所技能点完了，我还有必要花钱买dlc嘛，真就花钱买皮呗，怎么人家第五人格相同玩法还来个后来者居上呢，都上日区app畅销榜了，能反思一下自己的问题不，人类方每个角色的定位都模糊的一塌糊涂，都是张皮，玩法仅通过技能区别，人和人之间还不知道对方带的什么技能，哦辣是真的牛批
虽然游戏模式比较单一，但持续的更新让游戏保持了可玩性
新的匹配机制真是太好了 我们杀鸡真的是太好了（指20段匹配到4段）

Un jeu intéressant possédant une grande ambiance visuelle et sonore qui nous plonge dans un univers horrifique, l'optimisation du jeu me semble correcte. La partie stratégie est vraiment intéressante et bien développée, il y a également un arbre de compétences pour ne pas jouer pour rien, cependant le matchmaking du jeu est médiocre, voir horrible, durant mes 2 premières parties en tant que meurtriers je suis tombé sur des rangs 2 - 4, même eux se sont sentis mal pour moi. Le jeu reste néanmoins intéressant, surtout en la présence d'amis (en tant que survivants) cependant il faudrait revoir le matchmaking du jeu, un débutant qui tombe sur des joueurs avancé, ce n'est ni drôle pour lui, ni drôle pour eux

Would rather be playing than spend time writing reviews, but this game deserves a higher rating. The community can be kind of toxic at times, but it's mostly due to people not understanding what is proper etiquette in matches. Regardless, it has immense replay value and is wonderful to play with friends. Let the mind games begin.

I would recommend this game to people because it is a genuinely fun game to play, but the harsh downside is that trying to play killer, the matchmaking is bad, i just bought the game a few days ago and i'm not that great, yet no matter what rank a killer is at, whether they are new to the game or not, they are put with high ranking survivor who can bully the new player. in that regard this game isn't fun at the same time. all in all its fun with friends, but if you want to play killer, you'd have more fun playing the killer tutorial or playing killer in kill your friends then you will ever have in killer matchmaking.

Este juego tiene caracteristicas que lo hacen una excelente recomendación. Al principio puede ser muy frustrante, pero en mi opinion el progreso en el juego es premiado desde muchas perspectivas. En primer lugar, es dificil y la curva de aprendizaje es complicada de seguir, lo que lo convierte en un juego competitivo. Por si no es suficiente, las diversas metricas de progreso dentro del juego te mantienen motivado, avanzando y desbloqueando contenido con puntos del juego. Finalmente, aunque soy un jugador "reciente", he sentido como BHVR está activo agregando contenido y sacando parches de manera muy recurrente. 

Lo unico cuestionable que le he visto es que tiene un poco contenido pay-to-win, pero la verdad que no me altera demasiado por que todo se puede desbloquear jugando el suficiente tiempo, y estos beneficios no son demasiado game-breaking.

Me gustaría que aplicaran cambios de balance pues hay muchas habilidades fuera del meta-game, que si bien son entretenidas, pocas veces aportan al juego. Además hay asesinos que simplemente no permiten pasarlo bien (Freddy).

this game used to be great but now 4 survivors in a discord call unfortunately thats the majority of players now have it way to easy extra hit are needed to down them now there tools are way more effective they can cover 100 yards before the killer can get ready to swing again i used to love this game when i was new to the army my friends and i had full games with each other without there being a heavy tilt towards the survivors now. there just as fast as most killers it seems and they have more tools to escape than methods a killer has to down them the extra hit to keep them from the dying state the flashlights the overload of pallets and windows the game isnt fun to play as a killer and i played as a survivor alone and still had an easy time. they need to re-balance this game

matchmaking sucks. if you just now pick up the game, you are not gonna have fun. putting me against rank 1 swf when im only a rank 17. them being toxic while you have no perks to counter them ruins the fun. if you are a survivor main and disagree, then you are a part of the problem.

Con esta nueva actualización el juego esta injugable, lo rompieron completamente. Las persecuciones siempre van a estar a favor del asesino ya que no podemos calcular a que distancia nos pueden golpear porque aunque estando 5 metros delante de él siempre te va a pegar de forma muy falsa, sumando a que las hitbox las modificaron para peor. Los pallet ya están de adorno, porque aunque le tiremos y stunemos al asesino igual nos va a golpear y encima se va a teletrasportar mágicamente en donde estamos, quedando muy regalados. Si había bugs, ahora hay el DOBLE, paredes invisibles que te hacen inaccesible pasar por dentro de las estructuras tanto de survivor como killer, estructuras sin colisiones que le hacen muy fácil al asesino golpearte. Con estas nuevas animaciones da la sensación que el survivor no se mueve de forma fluida, como si fuera mucho mas lento, imposible hacer un 360 decentemente, porque cambiar algo que estaba jugablemente bien y que nadie pidió?. En cuanto al nuevo hud, lo odio completamente, es muy confuso y distrae mucho, no te aporta la misma información concisa que te daba el antiguo , parece que estuviera pensado para teléfonos (móviles). No estoy de acuerdo en no poder ganarte tus pepitas a base de realizar acciones en la partida sin que te escapes, ahora no tiene sentido jugar de survivor. En fin... los reworks de los mapas estan muy buenos, como lo es el rework del payaso que era necesario, pero centrarse en lo estético, agregar skins tras skins sin pulir la jugabilidad, los incontables bugs y la fluidez me parece desagradable por parte de los devs arrogantes e ineptos que pisotean a su comunidad la cuál nunca escucha y siempre da la espalda. Porfavor regresen al estado que estaba el juego antes, se encontraba en muy buena forma y era muy disfrutable. No lo recomiendo para nada, si no hacen algo pronto en el estado en el que esta el juego ahora, va a terminar muriendo.
ES UNA HERMOSURA LOCCOOOOOO DOOOOUUUU dea
This is a great horror multiplayer game. The emotions are very raw when playing this game with friends. (or random people) I also play the game on PS4 and XBOX.

A basic rundown of what you will see in DbD. Pros and Cons:

Being Unbalanced: It seems the community is absolutely addicted to thinking that either the Killer or the Survivor role has some edge to it. Don't get me wrong, there are lots of perks, offerings and items which can really screw a match over suddenly when you least expect it. Decisive Strike, Keys, Moris, Aura abilities, etc. If you follow the discussions on the Steam page, there will always be a demand for buffs and nerfs and all sorts of crazy stuff. However, in the end, barring a hacker being in your game? Just try your best, experiment around and find what works for you. DbD is a mind game where, no matter your role, you have to try to out-think your opponent. Don't get yourself down if you can't win a few matches, everything is a learning curve and an opportunity to get better. However, just be ready for that moment when you think you've got it and then, boom, NOED appears or something. Real gut punch that one.

Another aspect to consider is the rather random matchmaking, which seems to be at least a modicum better than it was last year. Basically, I remember being a rank seventeen having to play with rank fives and fours which was a real trial by fire and could be quite irritating. But, hey, I survived. It also seems that there is more balance to that system. Don't get me wrong, I still see real middle finger matches where a low rank ends up somewhere they shouldn't be and I bet it really messes with their day. I do see that the high ranks /sometimes/ work to try and help the low ones if they aren't just blathering around like a dumb dumb. Hopefully, this will get even better soon.

Now, a big pro in this games favor is the content. I love the notable horror icons, even if it sometimes feels they are coasting on the release of horror nostalgia to cover for not fixing different issues with both player roles. The new content tends to liven up the game some, give new challenges and a bit of a breath of fresh air. Even if I think we all wish there were some new things. What things? I don't know. I just feel the game needs something more, that is my opinion.

Hitboxes and Desync. Okay, so apparently this game operates on crap servers? I don't know, that is what I hear and it can be annoying as hell for both roles. The devs have been working on hitboxes (not so much the Desync mind you) and it feels like the progress is at a snail's pace. That is the major issue with DbD currently is the fact that you'll be swinging as a killer and missing for no reason, yet then a survivor vaults a window and they're hit when the killer is obviously out of range. Maybe they'll fix it? Doesn't make the game bad, just annoying sometimes.

Now, a note on the community: It can be super toxic. Don't get me wrong, do I think this game ranks high on the spectrum of toxic gaming? Well, yes. For some reason, DbD attracts some of the worst people you'll meet. There are also cool people though and the game itself is one that is still unbalanced, with some issues I noted up there ^, and that can lead towards frustrations and annoyances. Honestly? I'd suggest just not talking in chat unless you want to compliment someone on their awesome plays or something. Isn't much point in chatting now anyways, as they introduced cross play console players (which, if you don't want to wait a millenia for a match, mark that box and say you'll do it) they can't chat anyways so most of the time you're standing there all like "where did everybody go?". 

So, overall? Dead by Daylight is a game that has gotten popular for a reason. It can be a trial, and somedays people are just mean for the hell of it. But, it can be challenging and rewarding. Good sportsmanship and working with teammates can win the day for you. It can be fun taking chances, even if they don't pan out. I've made a few friends while playing it and I stink as killer, though maybe I'll get better someday? Who knows. It is worth the price at a discount, because there are some characters trapped behind paywalls with abilities the higher rank players say are absolutely necessary. Think The Sims, but with lots of death and drama. Oh wait, that is the Sims. Also, don't play Leatherface. Don't do it. if you do it, don't camp. It is too basic and expected. Have a nice day.~
